pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā vesāliyaṁ viharati mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā sandiṭṭhā sambhattā bhikkhū vaggumudāya nadiyā tīre vassaṁ upagacchiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.3: Tena kho pana samayena vajjī dubbhikkhā hoti—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.4: Atha kho tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ etadahosi—“etarahi kho vajjī dubbhikkhā—dvīhitikā setaṭṭhikā salākāvuttā, na sukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetuṁ. Kena nu kho mayaṁ upāyena samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vaseyyāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilameyyāmā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.5: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhema. Evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.6: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.7: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“alaṁ, āvuso, kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.8: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ harāma. Evaṁ te amhākaṁ dātuṁ maññissanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.9: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.10: Ekacce evamāhaṁsu—“alaṁ, āvuso; kiṁ gihīnaṁ kammantaṁ adhiṭṭhitena. Kiṁ gihīnaṁ dūteyyaṁ haṭena.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.11: Handa mayaṁ, āvuso, gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissāma—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.12: ‘asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu dutiyassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu tatiyassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu catutthassa jhānassa lābhī, asuko bhikkhu sotāpanno, asuko bhikkhu sakadāgāmī, asuko bhikkhu anāgāmī, asuko bhikkhu arahā, asuko bhikkhu tevijjo, asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.14: Evaṁ mayaṁ samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasissāma, na ca piṇḍakena kilamissāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.15: “Eso yeva kho, āvuso, seyyo, yo amhākaṁ gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇo bhāsito”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.16: Atha kho te bhikkhū gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsiṁsu—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.17: “asuko bhikkhu paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhī …pe… asuko bhikkhu chaḷabhiñño”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.18: Atha kho te manussā—“lābhā vata no, suladdhaṁ vata no, yesaṁ no evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā, na vata no ito pubbe evarūpā bhikkhū vassaṁ upagatā, yathayime bhikkhū sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.19: Te na tādisāni bhojanāni attanā bhuñjanti, mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.20: Na tādisāni khādanīyāni sāyanīyāni pānāni attanā khādanti sāyanti pivanti mātāpitūnaṁ denti puttadārassa denti dāsakammakaraporisassa denti mittāmaccānaṁ denti ñātisālohitānaṁ denti, yādisāni bhikkhūnaṁ denti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.1.21: Atha kho te bhikkhū vaṇṇavā ahesuṁ pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.1: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ vassaṁvuṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena vesālī tena pakkamiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.3: Anupubbena yena vesālī mahāvanaṁ kūṭāgārasālā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.5: Tena kho pana samayena disāsu vassaṁvuṭṭhā bhikkhū kisā honti lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.6: Vaggumudātīriyā pana bhikkhū vaṇṇavā honti pīṇindriyā pasannamukhavaṇṇā vippasannachavivaṇṇā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.7: Āciṇṇaṁ kho panetaṁ buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ āgantukehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṁ paṭisammodituṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.8: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.10: kacci samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.12: Samaggā ca mayaṁ, bhante, sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasimhā, na ca piṇḍakena kilamimhā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.13: Jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchanti, jānantāpi na pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.14: Kālaṁ viditvā pucchanti, kālaṁ viditvā na pucchanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.17: Dvīhākārehi buddhā bhagavanto bhikkhū paṭipucchanti—“dhammaṁ vā desessāma, sāvakānaṁ vā sikkhāpadaṁ paññapessāmā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.18: Atha kho bhagavā vaggumudātīriye bhikkhū etadavoca—“yathā kathaṁ pana tumhe, bhikkhave, samaggā sammodamānā avivadamānā phāsukaṁ vassaṁ vasittha, na ca piṇḍakena kilamitthā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.19: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.23: kathañhi nāma tumhe, bhikkhave, udarassa kāraṇā gihīnaṁ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṁ bhāsissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.25: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:1.2.26.1: “Yo pana bhikkhu anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṁ āroceyya bhūtasmiṁ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.6: bhikkhuñca bhikkhuniñca ṭhapetvā, avaseso anupasampanno nāma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.8: jhānaṁ, vimokkho, samādhi, samāpatti, ñāṇadassanaṁ, maggabhāvanā, phalasacchikiriyā, kilesappahānaṁ, vinīvaraṇatā cittassa, suññāgāre abhirati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.10: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.12: suññato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appaṇihito vimokkho.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.14: suññato samādhi, animitto samādhi, appaṇihito samādhi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.16: suññatā samāpatti, animittā samāpatti, appaṇihitā samāpatti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.20: cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni, satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.22: sotāpattiphalassa sacchikiriyā, sakadāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, anāgāmiphalassa sacchikiriyā, arahattassa sacchikiriyā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.24: rāgassa pahānaṁ, dosassa pahānaṁ, mohassa pahānaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.26: rāgā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, dosā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā, mohā cittaṁ vinīvaraṇatā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.1.28: paṭhamena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, dutiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, tatiyena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati, catutthena jhānena suññāgāre abhirati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.2: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjin”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.4: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjāmī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.6: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpanno”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.8: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa lābhimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.10: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamassa jhānassa vasimhī”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.12: anupasampannassa—“paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.16: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; catutthassa jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.23: appaṇihitaṁ samādhiṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; appaṇihitassa samādhissa lābhimhi, vasimhi; appaṇihito samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.27: appaṇihitaṁ samāpattiṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; appaṇihitāya samāpattiyā lābhimhi, vasimhi; appaṇihitā samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.29: anupasampannassa— “tisso vijjā samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; tissannaṁ vijjānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; tisso vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.33: cattāro iddhipāde samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; catunnaṁ iddhipādānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; cattāro iddhipādā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.36: pañca balāni samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; pañcannaṁ balānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; pañca balāni sacchikatāni mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.38: anupasampannassa— “satta bojjhaṅge samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; sattannaṁ bojjhaṅgānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; satta bojjhaṅgā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.40: anupasampannassa— “ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.45: arahattaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; arahattassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; arahattaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.49: moho me catto, vanto, mutto, pahīno, paṭinissaṭṭho, ukkheṭito, samukkheṭito”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.53: mohā me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.2.58: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; suññāgāre catutthassa jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; suññāgāre catutthaṁ jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.2: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa dutiyassa ca jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ dutiyañca jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.5: paṭhamañca jhānaṁ catutthañca jhānaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa catutthassa ca jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ catutthañca jhānaṁ sacchikataṁ mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.12: appaṇihitañca samādhiṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa appaṇihitassa ca samādhissa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ appaṇihito ca samādhi sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.16: appaṇihitañca samāpattiṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa appaṇihitāya ca samāpattiyā lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ appaṇihitā ca samāpatti sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.18: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṁ tisso ca vijjā samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa tissannañca vijjānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ tisso ca vijjā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.22: cattāro ca iddhipāde samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa catunnañca iddhipādānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ cattāro ca iddhipādā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.25: pañca ca balāni samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa pañcannañca balānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ pañca ca balāni sacchikatāni mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.27: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṁ satta ca bojjhaṅge samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa sattannañca bojjhaṅgānaṁ lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ satta ca bojjhaṅgā sacchikatā mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.29: anupasampannassa— “paṭhamañca jhānaṁ ariyañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ samāpajjiṁ, samāpajjāmi, samāpanno; paṭhamassa ca jhānassa ariyassa ca aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassa lābhimhi, vasimhi; paṭhamañca jhānaṁ ariyo ca aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo sacchikato mayā”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc8:2.3.42: mohā ca me cittaṁ vinīvaraṇan”ti bhaṇantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
